author: wsjcom
title: China-U.S. Trade on a Tilted Playing Field
text:
Regarding Robert J. Barro’s “Trump and China Share a Bad Idea on Trade” (op-ed, April 11): Technology is the basis of wealth creation. I think technology transfer is the real issue with China. All of this is a big experiment. Never in the history of human civilization has one civilization purposely divested itself of its technology. The second half of my career was largely devoted to offshoring technology from U.S. suppliers to primarily Asian suppliers. This included giving them all drawings, specifications, tooling and production fixtures, test equipment, quality-control criteria and training.
